contentencoded: Getting a college degree is more expensive than ever. Each year, the sticker price goes up about six percent – about twice the rate of inflation. The cost of college is causing some to wonder if a college degree is even worth it. On this week’s podcast, Marketplace economics correspondent Chris Farrell explains why a college education is actually more valuable than ever.
